block.p: CITIGROUP, New York, named Barbara Yastine chief financial officer at its investment bank, Salomon Smith Barney, and its Citibank corporate global relationship bank.
PRATT & WHITNEY, East Hartford, Conn., named Robert Leduc, executive vice president, to the additional post of chief operating officer.
CITIGROUP, New York, named Barbara Yastine chief financial officer at its investment bank, Salomon Smith Barney, and its Citibank corporate global relationship bank.
PRATT & WHITNEY, East Hartford, Conn., named Robert Leduc, executive vice president, to the additional post of chief operating officer.
SPRINT CORP., Kansas City, Mo., named Charles Levine, chief sales and marketing officer, to the post of chief operating officer.

TELIGENT, Vienna, Va., named John C. Wright chief financial officer, succeeding Cindy Tallent, who had been acting chief financial officer. Mr. Wright had been a partner at the Washington office of Ernst & Young.

TRILOGY ADVISORS, New York, has named Andrew Gordon the company's managing director and chief operating officer. He had been a managing director at Credit Suisse First Boston, heading the investment banking practice for money-management firms.
